verses.text: Then \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, whose \w son|strong="H1121"\w* he had restored to \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* thou and thine \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w wheresoever|strong="H0834"\w* thou canst \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for a \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*; and it shall also \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* after the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with her \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w sojourned|strong="H1481"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years’|strong="H8141"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w*, that the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and she went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* for her \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and for her \w land|strong="H7704"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H5608"\w* me, I pray thee, all the great \w things|strong="H1419"\w* that \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

And it came to pass, as he was \w telling|strong="H5608"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* how he had \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* a dead \w body|strong="H4191"\w* to \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, that, behold, the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, whose \w son|strong="H1121"\w* he had restored to \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* for her \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and for her \w land|strong="H7704"\w*. And \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, this \add is\add* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, and this \add is\add* her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whom \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* restored to \w life|strong="H2421"\w*.

And when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, she \w told|strong="H5608"\w* him. So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* unto her a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w officer|strong="H5631"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* all that \add was\add* hers, and all the \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that she \w left|strong="H5800"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, even until now.\f + \fr 8.6 \ft officer: or, eunuch\f*

¶ And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*; and \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*; and it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w hither|strong="H2008"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w present|strong="H4503"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* of this \w disease|strong="H2483"\w*?

So \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w present|strong="H4503"\w* with \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, even of every good \w thing|strong="H2898"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w camels’|strong="H1581"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* of this \w disease|strong="H2483"\w*?\f + \fr 8.9 \ft with…: Heb. in his hand\f*

And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou mayest \w certainly|strong="H2421"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*: howbeit the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me that he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And he \w settled|strong="H5975"\w* his \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w stedfastly|strong="H7760"\w*, until he was \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.\f + \fr 8.11 \ft stedfastly: Heb. and set it\f*

And \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Why \w weepeth|strong="H1058"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Because I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that thou wilt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: their strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w* wilt thou \w set|strong="H7971"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and their young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* wilt thou \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and wilt \w dash|strong="H7376"\w* their \w children|strong="H5768"\w*, and rip \w up|strong="H1234"\w* their women with \w child|strong="H2030"\w*.

And \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, But what, \add is\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, that he should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*? And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me that thou \add shalt be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*.

So he \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* from \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*; who \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, What \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* to thee? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, He \w told|strong="H0559"\w* me \add that\add* thou shouldest \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, that he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a thick \w cloth|strong="H4346"\w*, and \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* \add it\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \add it\add* on his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, so that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: and \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ And in the \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \add being\add* then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.\f + \fr 8.16 \ft began…: Heb. reigned\f*

\w Thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* was he when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: for the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* was his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: and he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Yet the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* sake, as he \w promised|strong="H0559"\w* him to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him \w alway|strong="H3117"\w* a \w light|strong="H5216"\w*, \add and\add* to his \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 8.19 \ft light: Heb. candle, or, lamp\f*

¶ In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w revolted|strong="H6586"\w* from under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w made|strong="H4427"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over themselves.

So \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Zair|strong="H6811"\w*, and all the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* with him: and he \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Edomites|strong="H0123"\w* which compassed him \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* into their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

Yet \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w revolted|strong="H6586"\w* from under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. Then \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w* \w revolted|strong="H6586"\w* at the \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 8.24 \ft Ahaziah: also called, Azariah, and Jehoahaz\f*

¶ In the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* begin to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 8.26 \ft daughter: or, granddaughter\f*

And he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as \add did\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: for he \add was\add* the son in \w law|strong="H2860"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*.

¶ And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* to the \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* in \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*; and the \w Syrians|strong="H0761"\w* \w wounded|strong="H5221"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* went \w back|strong="H7725"\w* to be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* of the \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* which the \w Syrians|strong="H0761"\w* had \w given|strong="H5221"\w* him at \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, when he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*. And \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, because he was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 8.29 \ft which…: Heb. wherewith the Syrians had wounded\f*\f + \fr 8.29 \ft Ramah: called Ramoth\f*\f + \fr 8.29 \ft sick: Heb. wounded\f*
